Approximator * approx

Detailed Description

Generic transformation of an approximator to permit screwing with the output values of approximators without having to reimplement every single method of an approximator. Knows about, and performs, basic policy, or value, gradient operations.

void libpg::TransformApproximator::computeDirection ( int   )  [virtual]

Update the search direction for the parameters from the current gradient and possible past information. For GPOMDP and most codes this is empty. This could hold conjugation code Or it can extract natural actor critic search direction
